description:
Standing up for the little guy against big business, Namidome Industries declares war on Shiota Chemical and sets about ridding Ryugan Island of the Giant Beasts as well as the bacteria that has been causing the animals to mutate.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Rise, Bullbuster! All Out War Between Namidome and Shiota! Which Will Prevail: the Big Business`s Logic or the Small Business`s Guts?!
Tate, Bullbuster! Namidome vs Shiota: Zenmensensou! Katsu no wa Daikigyou no Ronri ka, Chuushoukigyou no Sokojikara ka!?
立て, ブルバスター! 波止 vs 塩田 全面戦争! 勝つのは大企業の論理か, 中小企業の底力か!?
